### Settings

```{r settings}
  actionButton('start','Start')
  actionButton('stop','Stop')
  actionButton('reset','Reset')
  numericInput('seconds','Seconds:',value=5,min=0,max=99999,step=1)
  hr()
  selectInput(
        "lang",
        label = "Select your language",
        choices = c(empty = "", languages),
        selected = "",
        multiple = FALSE
      )
  selectInput(
        "tt",
        label = "Training type",
        choices = c(empty = ""),
        selected = "",
        multiple = FALSE
      )
  selectInput(
        "gr",
        label = "Training groups (empty for all groups)",
        choices = c(empty = ""),
        selected = "",
        multiple = TRUE
      )
```



```{r udpate-settings}

# update training type based on language
  tts <- reactive({
    training_type(input$lang)
  })

  observeEvent(input$lang, {
    
    updateSelectInput(
      session,
      "tt",
      choices = c(empty = "", tts()),
      selected = ""
    )
  })

# update training groups based on training type
  ttf <- reactive({
    if (input$lang == ""  | input$tt == "") {
      ttf <- NULL
    }  else {
      ttf <- training_type_file(lang = input$lang, 
                                tt   = input$tt, 
                                url_base)
    }
    return(ttf)
    
  })
  
  observeEvent(input$tt, {
    
    if(is.null(ttf())) {
      groups <- c(empty = "")
    } else {
      groups <- c("all", ttf()[, unique(group)])
    }
    
      
    updateSelectInput(
      session,
      "gr",
      choices = groups,
      selected = ""
    )
  })



```

```{r}
  # Initialize the timer, 5 seconds, not active.
  timer <- reactiveVal(5)
  active <- reactiveVal(FALSE)

  # observer that invalidates every second. If timer is active, decrease by one.
  observe({
    invalidateLater(1000, session)
    isolate({
      if(active()) {

        timer(timer()-1)
        if(timer()<1)
        {

          timer(input$seconds)

        }
      }
    })
  })

  # observers for actionbuttons
  observeEvent(input$start, {
    timer(input$seconds)
    active(TRUE)
    })
  observeEvent(input$stop, {active(FALSE)})
  observeEvent(input$reset, {timer(input$seconds)})

```


```{r timeleft}
# Output the time left.
  textOutput('timeleft')
  renderText({
    paste("Time left: ", seconds_to_period(timer()))
  })
  
```


```{r word}
words <- reactive({
  if ("all"  %in% input$gr) {
    dt <- copy(ttf())
  } else {
    dt <- ttf()[group  %in% input$gr]
  }
  
  words <- dt[, to_read]
  return(words)
})

textOutput('word')
output$word <-   renderText({
    invalidateLater(input$seconds*1000)
    if(active()) {
      sample(words(), 1)
    }
  })

```
